txt.en: 'Welcome to Gondamon, great outpost of the dwarves.'
'Our hunters range far afield in search of food to support our people.'
'There is little rest for a guard of Gondamon, but that is the price of peace in the Blue Mountains.'
'This is a worthy post, but sometimes I yearn for the glory of the goblin-strife to the south.'
Oglir shifts from one foot to the other, and looks a little bored.
'I was quite the hunter in my younger days. No one wanted for meat when I returned from a hunt.'
'Watch yourself if you travel south. There are goblins in the valley beyond the barricade.'
'The crisp air of the Blue Mountains is good for you. Breathe deeply!'
'The wilderness has many dangers for unwary travellers. Stay alert to threats on the Road!'
'There is always much work to do around Gondamon. Our people live in safety bought with our strength!'
'If you see one of our hunters in the wild, send him my greetings. On long days, I miss the hunting life of my youth.'
